name: CHK-003-CIV-Precast Reinforced Concrete Pipes (RCP) & Pits - Material Delivery Inspection
Document Title: CHK-003-CIV-Precast Reinforced Concrete Pipes (RCP) & Pits - Material Delivery Inspection
Check list Description: Precast Reinforced Concrete Pipes (RCP) & Pits - Material Delivery Inspection
ITP created by: Jon De Castro
ITP approved for use by: Aldrin Guinchoma
(1) Precast items manufactured in accordnace with IFC Drawings
(1) Purchase Order and Material Description and Qtys matches
(2) Ensure precast concrete elements are as per IFC Drawings upon delivery and no damage evident.
(3) Lifting and Manufacture compliance certification provided
VERIFYING DOCUMENTS: Material Delivery Docket, Purchase Order
(1) Ensure Manufacturer’s certificates of compliance are received for precast RCP during delivery on site and min required strength is achieved prior to transporting.
VERIFYING DOCUMENTS: Material Delivery Docket, Compliance Certificate
(1) Identification of product is legible (Stamp, Label, Etc) and should be marked on every precast element.
(2) Precast elements are unloaded and stored properly on site as per manufacturer's instructions.
